title: Recollections from Cuevas' Comedies
medium: Lithograph and embossing from a portfolio of ten lithographs (one with screenprint and embossing, one with embossing) and five screenprints (two double-sided, one with collage additions)
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 21 3/16 x 26 15/16" (53.8 x 68.5 cm); sheet (slightly irreg.): 22 7/16 x 30 5/16" (57 x 77 cm)
